 2011-05742011-05-18,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Steven John Fletcher and Assigning the Honourable Steven John Fletcher to Assist the Minister of Transport
PrecisOrder a) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Steven John Fletcher, made by Order in Council P.C. 2008-1718 of October 30, 2008, and b) assigning the Honourable STEVEN JOHN FLETCHER as Minister of State to be styled Minister of State (Transport), to assist the Minister of Transport. Effective May 18, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2011-0039 Publication Date: 2011-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
